Featured-image: CJ207-blush-ruched-bodice-lace-overlay-evening-dress_p.jpg

Description: Princess scoop neckline is lace and extends to the back of the gown. The pleated plunging sweetheart is met with a pleated waistline that cascades into the pleated chiffon skirt. The skirt flows to the floor and features a sweeping train.
